Blog.post: kkz... im here typing instead of ztudying my science... hehe..... jus feel like typing here lorz... kkz... the first post is not i write one... its my crazy friend added.. it makes me sonded like siao.. hahaz... i think she got nothing to den added in ... kkz... ztudyig now looks like reading thru story books tat i don kinda' like.... hai... well now must ztudy hard le ... don wanna upset my parents.... but sometimes it jus gets so hard jus to remember a few stuffz... hai... me and my ztupid brain... cant get formulaes in or some other ztudying stuffx in... okz.. todaz is a sunday and im kinda late if i continue typing here... well but anyway my dad and sis still zzz... away.... i m now like feeling tired.... jus don feel like talking to anybody now on the phone.... my good friend now watching soccer on channel five think i shud watch too ? hahaz... kkz... oh ya... jus got this nice and unique nickname i shud say.... its janastacia.... well i kinda' have 7 nicknames? well it sortof' us comes in my head and the next moment its a nice nickname...hahax weird rite.... even names can come out like that in my head.... kkz... i this few dyaz jus come out with a new song... but it needs the guitar ... den it will sound perfect to me.... kkz.. i kinda' need to go now ... so tata... sMiLeZ...=) sTaY hApY', janastacia _clariej

today is a .... a..... a..... shud say a normal day for me? today is a sunday... whud be going to church kinda' of now or ltr... kkz.. i today kinda feel tired ... must ztudy hard for me science and chinese ... well really hope tat i'll pass... but will try my best lorz... okz... now i shud be ztudying for my science and yet im here typing away... hahaz..wwell i jus fell like typing .... i this few dayz like very dreamy ... its not onli dreamy but its very very very dreamy ... don know why... ya see my friendster bulletin den knows le... yoz.. when did i type so much? hahax.... continue.... i find that this few dayz like kinda' get closer to god? i don know .... but all i know is that i like kinda' changed... become very quiet at times... moody.... and don feel like talking to anybody. or etc....

today is a ... a.... normal day.... hahax.. my good friend came to my house... and now she is sitting beside me... hahax kkz.. at last i pass my english.... got 15 upon 30... kkz.. i know.. very pathetic rite? well at least i pass den no need to let the old and naggy teacher say me ! haiz cant stand him lorz... nag here, nag there hahax i know i very bad ...kkz not really that naggy la... hahax know something? my friend here very scared tmr cause cause... aiya don say le lah ltr she angry... i being a good friend don make my friend angry one c(=** kkz.. now gota' go off le.. oh ya .. by the way the first crazy post is my crazy friend write one... i think she have nothing to do la... any how write... hahaz...kkz bye! c(=** janastacia_clarie_stargirl...

okz.... today was a tiring day.... do so much work in school.... wa! my brain bursting le... was reading this fav book of mine for abt twice? read this and sounds nice... so here goes... "Misty morning mist is lifting, melody of trees slowly sifting thru the gold green branches. Dappled morning sun is flying, breaths of breezes rising, dying, brushing over the earth's brown skin. Happy morning my heart is singing, arms spread wide the dawn is bringing its sunglow to this life, of mine." so nice .... today learn new song... for choir.. the song very nice... have like those ... very nice melody.... this few dayz my life has changed so much and so fast.... so many things have been changing so quickly... i think that even my best friend, her life also changed... i find myself more like in a new world? think* so... hahax or maybe i day dreaming... hahax..... heyz... jus saw a bright star... must make a wish... i wish.... ********................................................................. kkz... i now damn scared that tmr give the gangters find me again for no reason.... hai.... looks like mix with wrong friends le.... sian.. everyday must face their sickening looks hai.. e other thing is my studies... im so so stupid.... daily work can do ok but when come to test i thing also canot remember.... also most everyday stay at home and study... but then cant pass or is either jus pass by one mark only... i tink studies is not for me... i better in other thing ba... well anyway what i can do now is to try my very best to pass and hope that teacher will give me a chance to go to express.... my academic class sux sux sux so much ... like don talk or shout also will die... drivin me mad man! they sux so much.. especially those childish little boys... still singin the teletubbies song at this age... so shamefull... i don think they will ever grow up hai.... jc_girl....
